snippet.title: Kotlin Messenger 09: Latest Messages Listener with HashMap
snippet.description:
Messages appearing in real time is an important aspect of a good chat application. In today's episode, we'll go ahead and flesh out the important parts of the Latest Messages list view.  To get this done correctly, we'll add a new node to Firebase Database and monitor its children.  Enjoy.
